DOC.brief_title: Effect Dexmedetomidine Gastric Emptying Gastrointestinal Transit
DOC.criteria: Normal cognitive function fluent skill Finnish language order able give inform consent communicate study personnel Age ≥ 18 year . Male gender . Weight ≥ 60 kg . Written inform consent subject . Previous history intolerance study drug related compound additive . Concomitant drug therapy kind except ibuprofen 14 day prior study day . Existing recent significant disease . History haematological , endocrine , metabolic gastrointestinal disease . History asthma kind drug allergy . Previous present alcoholism , drug abuse , psychological emotional problem likely invalidate inform consent , limit ability subject comply protocol requirement . A positive test result urine toxicology . A `` yes '' answer question modify Finnish version Abuse Questions Donation blood within six week prior study . Special diet lifestyle factor would compromise condition study interpretation result . BMI > 30 kg / m2 . Participation clinical study involve investigational market drug product concomitantly within one month prior entry study . Smoking one month start study study period . Clinically significant abnormal finding physical examination , ECG laboratory screen [ routine haematology ( haemoglobin , haematocrit , red blood cell count , white blood cell count , platelet ) , renal function test ( creatinine , urea ) liver function test ( bilirubin ) ] .
